name: Vegas Boneyard Letter Lights
description:
Sorry! The Christmas 2013 order deadline has passed. We'll now be busily making all our orders we've received for Christmas delivery. We can still take orders but PLEASE BE AWARE THEY WILL NOT BE DELIVERED TIL END OF FEB/EARLY MARCH 2014. Vegas Style free standing letter lights are constructed from layers of MDF, painted in a black and white aged/distressed effect, and finished with high gloss. They can be wall mounted or free standing. Available in any letter of the alphabet.

Letter Lights

The letters are supplied with all bulbs as shown. The bulbs are low wattage (15 watt) pilot lights and easily replaced at hardware stores for approx $4 each. A light switch and dimmer is installed (with power cord) so you can control the brightness to suit any occasion. Dimensions are 59cm (h) x 12cm (d) and width varies depending of the letter. Weight varies from approx 10 kilos up to 15 kilos. We do not mass manufacture overseas. Our products are hand made and no two lights are the same. The distressed/aged finish is intentional and each item will show marks, abrasions and general 'wear and tear' that is unique to that letter. Each letter is made to order and typically take 2-4 weeks depending on current workload, plus shipping time.

name: Vegas Boneyard Star Light
description:
Sorry! The Christmas 2013 order deadline has passed. We'll now be busily making all our orders we've received for Christmas delivery. We can still take orders but PLEASE BE AWARE THEY WILL NOT BE DELIVERED TIL END OF FEB/EARLY MARCH 2014. Vegas Style free standing star lights are constructed from layers of MDF, painted in a black and white aged/distressed effect, and finished with high gloss.

Star Light

The stars are supplied with all bulbs as shown. The bulbs are low wattage (15 watt) pilot lights and easily replaced at hardware stores for approx $4 each. A light switch and dimmer is installed (with power cord) so you can control the brightness to suit any occasion. Dimensions are 57 cm (side to side), 60cms (tip to tip) and 10.5 cm depth. Weight is approx 8 kilos. We do not mass manufacture overseas. Our products are hand made and no two lights are the same. The distressed/aged finish is intentional and each item will show marks, abrasions and general 'wear and tear' that is unique to that piece. Each star is made to order and typically take 2-4 weeks depending on current workload, plus shipping time.

name: Monsieur Ampersand Letter Light
description:
Sorry! The Christmas 2013 order deadline has passed. We'll now be busily making all our orders we've received for Christmas delivery. We can still take orders but PLEASE BE AWARE THEY WILL NOT BE DELIVERED TIL END OF FEB/EARLY MARCH 2014. Monsieur Ampersand is a free standing ampersand light constructed from layers of MDF, painted in a black and white aged/distressed effect, and finished with high gloss. Wall mounted or free standing it is a timeless statement for your home or workplace.

Ampersand Letter Light

The letters are supplied with all bulbs as shown. The bulbs used are low wattage (15 watt) pilot lights and easily replaced at hardware stores for approx $4 each. A light switch and dimmer is installed (with power cord) so you can control the brightness to suit any occasion. Dimensions are 59cm (H), 10cm (D) about 55cm (W). Weight is approx 12 kilos. We do not mass manufacture overseas. Our products are hand made and no two lights are the same. The distressed/aged finish is intentional and each item will show marks, abrasions and general 'wear and tear' that is unique to each product. Each ampersand is made to order and typically take 2-4 weeks depending on current workload, plus shipping time.

name: The Fighting Words - Blam!
description: Red perspex pop art style wall art for kids with secret super powers (or even grown ups who still believe.....). Dimensions: 30cm (H) 90cm (L) 6mm (D). Supplied with double sided 3M velcro wall fixing. Constructed of two layers of perspex (red on black) these pieces look incredible in a kid's bedroom or anywhere you want to make a statement!
